j=0; j<n2; ++j) R[j] = arr[m + 1+ j]; int i = 0, j = 0; int k = l; while (i < n1 && j < n2) { if (L[i] <= R[j]) { arr[k] = L[i]; i++; } else { arr[k] = R[j]; j++; } k++; } while (i < n1) { arr[k] = == '(') // finished left to right remove(reversed, ans, 0, 0, new char[]{')', '('}); else // finished right to left ans.add(reversed); } Binary Tree Right Side
